attributes.action: ride a donkey through parliament square on the 6th June 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Has nobody else felt a liTtle dissapointed that the prime minister, of this glorious nation has yet to uphold the medieval tradition of riding a donkey through parliament square on the night of the 6th of June. Please sign up i you would like to see TB do this.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
